title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 218-9.1 - Severability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 218-9.1 - Severability

State Regulations

For all 2016 and subsequent model year passenger cars, light-duty trucks, and medium-duty vehicles, and motor vehicle engines; and all
2026 and subsequent model year heavy-duty vehicles and motor vehicle engines, subject to section
218-2.1
of this Part, each
manufacturer shall provide warranty coverage that complies with California Code
of Regulations, title 13, sections
2035
through
2041, and
2046
(see Table 1, section
200.9
of this

Title). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
218-9.1

Amended

New

York State Register July 26, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 30, eff. 7/6/2023, exp. 9/3/2023
(Emergency)

Amended

New

York State Register August 23, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 34, eff. 9/4/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
